articles.description: Kevin de Bruyne bid an emotional send-off from Etihad Stadium for the final time on Tuesday night - and the moment even brought Pep Guardiola to tears.
articles.title: Kevin de Bruyne: Man City 'genius' bids farewell at Etihad Stadium

articles.description: Pep Guardiola has said he will quit as Manchester City manager unless he is given a smaller squad next season.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Manchester City manager says he will quit club if squad size not reduced

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he "couldn't get more" out of his partnership with Andy Murray but is in no rush to find a new coach as the French Open approaches.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic says he 'couldn't get more' out of Andy Murray coaching partnership

articles.description: Eddie Nketiah scores twice and FA Cup hero Eberechi Eze also scores as Crystal Palace continue their celebrations from winning their first major trophy at the weekend by beating Wolves.
articles.title: Nketiah scores twice as Palace beat Wolves

articles.description: An emotional Ange Postecoglou angrily refuted suggestion he is a "clown" in a combative news conference on the eve of Tottenham's Europa League final against Manchester United.
articles.title: Europa League final: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou refutes suggestion he is 'a clown'

articles.description: Fourteen-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi impresses again with 57 in Rajasthan Royals' six-wicket victory over Chennai Super Kings.
articles.title: IPL 2025: Vaibhav Suryavanshi impresses again with 57 in Rajasthan Royals win

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Martinez, Cucurella, Konsa, Bradley, Milenkovic, Rice, Ayari, Elliott, Ndiaye, Nketiah, Vardy

articles.description: Everton condemn the "threatening, racist, and misogynistic" abuse aimed towards the wife of Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
articles.title: Dominic Calvert-Lewin: Everton condemn "threatening, racist, and misogynistic" abuse of striker's wife Sandra

articles.description: Kevin de Bruyne signs off from his last home game for Manchester City on a high, as they beat Bournemouth to close in on a place in the Champions League next season - and both sides finish with 10 men.
articles.title: Man City 3-1 Bournemouth: Marmoush, Silva and Gonzalez score for hosts

articles.description: Ruben Amorim is not under pressure at Manchester United, but thinks his team may be looked at "in a different way" if they beat Tottenham in Bilbao on Wednesday.
articles.title: Europa League final: Ruben Amorim thinks Man Utd would be seen differently with win
